data.title: studiostyleandspa
data.meta_description: We offer on location or in the salon bridal hair & makeup.
data.text:
Asya is a licensed bridal hair and makeup artist who has been helping brides look their best on their big day since 2017. Since starting her career, Asya has gained a reputation for her ability to create flawless, natural glam makeup and beautifully styled hair that complements each bride's unique features and personal style. Asya brings a warm, friendly presence to her work that helps brides feel relaxed and confident on their special day. Not only does she focus on creating a positive, enjoyable experience for her brides, Asya has helped the salon win several "best of bridal" awards for our area over the past 4 years. Please feel free to browse through her portfolio below and contact our bridal coordinator if you would like to book Asya for your date!

Grace has been a licensed cosmetologist since 2020 and has specialized in bridal hair and makeup ever since. Grace has a keen eye for detail and a passion for making brides look and feel their best. Whether you're looking for airbrush makeup or a more natural look, Grace has the expertise to bring your vision to life. Grace prides herself on her ability to provide a calm and relaxing experience for her brides, making sure that the getting-ready process is enjoyable and stress-free. With a friendly and professional approach, Grace will work closely with you to understand your preferences, and then execute your desired look. After browsing her portfolio below, contact our bridal coordinator if you'd like to book Grace for your date. Let's make your wedding day unforgettable!

Our bridesmaid team dedicated to making sure that each and every member of the bridal party looks and feels their best on the big day. Our team has years of experience in creating gorgeous hair and makeup looks for bridesmaids that complement the bride's overall look and style.

"I enjoyed the facial experience so much that I booked two more appointments this week. Thank you"

​

"I couldn't say 1 single negative thing about my experience from start to finish. The salon was great and Britt was amazing."

​

"Grace did a very detailed, thorough pedicure and was so friendly and accommodating. Will definitely refer her and be back soon!"

​
